page.title: 07THE SCHOOL DAY
page.content: My name is Daniel Humble. I live in a semi-detached house in Bishop Auckland. These are the events of a typical Tuesday. I get up at 8.00am and get dressed. I go down for my breakfast which is usually Cornflakes. Then I go upstairs and get ready for school. I travel to school in the car and leave home at 8.45am. At 9.30am Andrew, James and I have clarinet lessons. At 10.00am we go back to the class for mental arithmetic. At playtime we go to Woodhouse Close school for a swimming lesson. They have a small learner pool which our class uses once a fortnight. We have our lunch in the school hall. In the afternoon we have P.E then science. When I get home I have my tea and then I go to my grandmas with my mam.
